chapters.title: Chapter 16:  The Subject of Negotiations
chapters.info:
Nisao Dachen,
      p. 398 (477)â€”Aes Sedai of the Yellow Ajah.  She agreed to assist
      Myrelle with helping Lan
      because of problems she foresaw with his mind.  Her specialty as a
      Yellow sister is psychiatric problems.  She tried to help
      Egwene with her headaches, but could not find the
      cause of them.  Her Warder is named Sarin.
      See also
      Hoigan, Sarin.
